headline: X Hinted at Possible Deal Trouble in Talks With Ad Giant to Increase Spending
summary: Interpublic Group recently signed an advertising agreement with the social-media platform; other agencies are also in negotiations.

raw.headline: X Hinted at Possible Deal Trouble in Talks With Ad Giant to Increase Spending
raw.summary: Interpublic Group recently signed an advertising agreement with the social-media platform; other agencies are also in negotiations.

headline: Interpublic Group to Present at the Barclays Communications and Content Symposium 2025
summary: New York, NY, Feb. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) senior management will present at the Barclays Communications and Content Symposium on Tuesday, February 25th, 2025, at 9:50 am Eastern Time, as scheduled. A link to the live webcast will be posted on the day of the conference on the Investor Relations section of Interpublic's website (http://investors.interpublic.com) where it will remain available for replay for 30 days. # # # About InterpublicInterpublic (NYSE: IPG)
